memberdef.name: APP_SIGFOX_SEND_INTERVAL_IN_MS
memberdef.initializer: (((24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) /* 24 hours per day * 60 minutes per hour * 60 seconds per minute * 1000 milli-seconds per second */ \ * ((APP_SENSOR_ACCEL + APP_SENSOR_GYRO + APP_SENSOR_HUMIDITY \ + APP_SENSOR_TEMP + APP_SENSOR_PRESSURE + APP_SENSOR_LIGHT)) / 140)) /* The maximum number of SIGFOX data transmission is limited to 140 */

detaileddescription.para: APP_SIGFOX_WAKEUP_INTERVAL_IN_MS is the chip wakeup interval exceeding which if the chip is idle, it would go to sleep mode.
